text:
The Carnage Hounds, sometimes known as the Walhounds, are a [[Carrion Tribe|Carrion Tribes]] of the [[Demon Wastes]] who venerate a great [[fiend]] of the [[Wild Heart]] known as [[Uushak]], the Carrion King. The tribe tends to follow in the warpath of other [[Carrion Tribes]], taking what is left behind, killing those crippled in battle, and eating the flesh of the dead. 

Approximately half of the Carnage Hounds are [[gnoll]]s, and the remaining half is a mix of [[tiefling]]s, [[human]]s, and [[orc]]s.
title: Carnage Hounds
